mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.reviewer, r.reviewee, r.rv_content, m.member_pic, p.product_title, r.rv_score, p.product_num, p.product_pic, t.type_div FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.reviewer = m.member_id JOIN product p ON r.reviewee = p.product_seller and r.prod_num = p.product_num JOIN trade t ON r.reviewer = t.buy_mem_id WHERE reviewer = #{id} AND t.type_div = 'prod' ;

select r.reviewer, r.reviewee, r.rv_content, m.member_pic, p.product_title, r.rv_score, p.product_num, p.product_pic, t.type_div from trade t join product p on t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id join review r on r.reviewer = m.member_id and r.prod_num = p.product_num where reviewee = #{id};

select t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id,t.sell_mem_id,t.type_div,p.product_title,t.prod_num, p.product_price, p.product_pic,p.product_cate,m.member_nickname from trade t join product p on t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id where t.buy_mem_id = #{id} and type_div = 'prod';

select t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id,t.sell_mem_id,t.type_div,p.product_title,t.prod_num, p.product_price,p.product_pic,p.product_cate,m.member_nickname from trade t join product p on t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id where t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num and type_div = 'prod';
mapper.insert: insert into review(rv_num,reviewee, reviewer, rv_score, rv_content,prod_num) values(#{rv_num},#{reviewee},#{reviewer},#{rv_score},#{rv_content},#{prod_num});
mapper.select: select avg(rv_score) from review group by reviewee having reviewee = #{reviewee}

select au_num, au_startPrice, au_endTime, au_sellerId, au_buyerId, max(au_bidPrice)as au_bidPrice, au_endPrice, au_pic, au_status, au_title,au_content, au_category from auction where au_buyerId = #{id} and au_num is not null and au_bidPrice != 0 group by au_num order by au_num desc;
select max(au_bidPrice) as au_bidPrice from auction group by au_num order by au_num desc;

select au_num, au_startPrice, au_endTime, au_sellerId, au_buyerId, max(au_bidPrice)as au_bidPrice, au_endPrice, au_pic, au_status, au_title,au_content, au_category from auction where au_sellerId = #{id} and au_num is not null group by au_num order by au_num desc;

select f.product_num, f.member_id, p.product_title,p.product_price,p.product_pic,p.product_seller,p.product_readcount, p.product_favorite from favorite f join product p on f.product_num = p.product_num where f.member_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where member_id = #{member_id} and product_num = #{product_num}
mapper.select: select ran_num, ran_price, ran_endTime, ran_sellerId, ran_buyerId, ran_pic, ran_maxPp, ran_title, ran_content, ran_bidPrice, ran_status from random where ran_sellerId = #{id} and ran_num is not null group by ran_num order by ran_num desc;
